name: ColoradoNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Colorado News brings you all the important information happening in the Centennial State.

We cover breaking news, sports, business and other important events.

New episodes go live at 8 a.m. So, click the enable button!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
